import React, { Component } from "react"; import axios from "axios"; import swal from "@sweetalert/with-react"; export class login extends Component { constructor() { super(); this.state = { Email: "", Passoword: "", regions_api: { value: "", name: "", }, province_api: { value: "", name: "", }, cities_api: { value: "", name: "", }, region_change: "", province_change: "", }; this.Password = this.Password.bind(this); this.Email = this.Email.bind(this); this.login = this.login.bind(this); } Email(event) { this.setState({ Email: event.target.value }); } Password(event) { this.setState({ Password: event.target.value }); } login(event) { fetch("http://localhost:8000/api/auth/login", { method: "post", headers: { Accept: "application/json, text/plain, */*", "Content-Type": "application/json", }, body: JSON.stringify({ email: this.state.Email, password: this.state.Password, }), }) .then((Response) => Response.json()) .then((result) => { console.log(result); if (result.status == "error") { alert(result.message); } else if (result.status == "success") { alert(result.status); } else if (result.status == "fail") { alert(result.status); } }); } render() { return ( <>

); } } export default login;
